title: Inscription recording the municipium of Halaesa
support: Described by Torremuzza as inscribed on 'un grande intaglio di marmo'

date._: Assumed to be Augustan, but could be later.

provenanceFound._: First recorded by Torremuzza in 1749 and 1753 'fra le ruine' of Halaesa

graphics.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana
